uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper

Class WikiFetch

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper.WikiFetch

extends java.lang.Object
    Class providing methods to get Wikipedia articles. Is uninstantiable.

    Stuart

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public static java.util.List<WikiArticle> search(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                 int max,
                                                 int edits)
                                          throws WikiException
        Search Wikipedia for articles simply by supplying a string. Can return an empty list.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - String to search with.
        max - Maximum number of articles to return.
        edits - Number of edits to put with each article. Make zero to prevent an extra query for edits to be made.
        Returns:
        List of fetched articles ordered in the order that WIkipedia gives them. Can be empty.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails.
